alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 18 at 9:49AM CDT until June 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall that fell yesterday. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the cimarron river in northern beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.2 feet this afternoon. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CDT.
